refnamediv.refpurpose: Scripting for Remote Telescope System, 2nd Version

refsect1.title: SYNOPSIS
refsect1.para: Scripting is used to command variours devices which can be found in RTS2 setup.

refsect1.title: COMMANDS
refsect1.para: Commands are separated by arbitary number of spaces. Parameters are in following description enclosed in {curved brackets}, explanation of their meaning is given in text. Numerical values are entered in standard decimal notation.

listitem.para: Takes light exposure. Exposure time is specified in seconds.
Takes dark frame, usefull for callibration. Exposure time is specified in seconds.
Changes filter on camera filter wheel. Filter numbers are always counted from 0.
Changes filter on camera filter wheel. Filter numbers are always counted from 0.
Changes filter on camera filter wheel. Filter numbers are always counted from 0.
Reserved for focusing command. Not implemented yet.
Change both vertical and horizontal binning. Will be dropped in favour of constant settings.
Readout area of chip, specified by pixel coordinates of upper left cornen (x and y) and width and heigh.
Readout center of chip of provided width and heigh (in pixels).

Take image of {exposure_time}, try astrometry, wait for result. If image is not within {precision} degrees from target position, repeat it. It can take more images, as long as precission of last image is at least twice better then previous image - e.g. if o1 is offset of last image, and o0 is offset of previous one, o1 < o2 / 2.
Wait for finish of A command on other camera. If there isn't any script with A command for any device, it will pass to next command.
